Self-Rating.tip: Ask the patient: 'On a scale of 1-10, 1 being the worst and 10 being the best, how would you rate your speech right now?'

Intelligibility.tip: Judge during running speech tasks. Estimate of the percentage of words correctly understood.

Naturalness.tip: Judge during running speech of how well speech matches normal standards of rate, pitch, and loudness (1 = Least Natural, 100 = Most Natural).

Efficiency.tip: Judge during running speech for the rate of information conveyed (Intelligible Words Per Minute). Note if communication is slowed by effort, frequent repairs, or pauses, rather than performing a formal calculation.
